resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105274</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105274</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202713</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fun with Angles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spaß mit Winkeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Amusement avec des angles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Divertimento com ângulos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Divertimento con gli angoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διασκέδαση με τις γωνίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversión con ángulos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson plan will help the students visualize the different angles (corresponding, alternate interior, and same-side interior) when coplanar lines are cut by a transversal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Lektionplan hilft den Kursteilnehmern, die 
unterschiedlichen Winkel (entsprechend, Alternativinneren und 
Gleichseite Inneren) sichtbar zu machen wenn koplanare Zeilen durch 
ein transversales geschnitten werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce plan de leçon aidera les étudiants à 
visualiser les différents angles (correspondant, l'intérieur de 
remplacement, et l'intérieur de même-côté) quand des lignes 
coplanaires sont coupées par un transversal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta planta da lição ajudará aos estudantes 
visualizar os ângulos diferentes (que correspondem, o interior da 
substituição, e o interior do mesmo-lado) quando as linhas coplanar 
são cortadas por um transversal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo programma di lezione aiuterà gli allievi a 
prevedere gli angoli differenti (che corrispondono, l'interiore 
dell'alternativa e l'interiore del stesso-lato) quando le righe 
complanari sono tagliate da un trasversale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το σχέδιο μαθήματος θα βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές 
να απεικονίσουν τις διαφορετικές γωνίες (αντιστοιχία, 
εναλλάσσομαι εσωτερικό, και ίδιος-δευτερεύον εσωτερικό) όταν 
κόβονται οι συνεπίπεδες γραμμές από έναν εγκάρσιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este plan de la lección ayudará a los estudiantes
a visualizar los diversos ángulos (que corresponden, el interior del 
suplente, y el interior de la mismo-cara) cuando las líneas 
coplanarias son cortadas por un transversal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:TEACHERS CONNECT
FN:TEACHERS CONNECT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202713</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105274</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/fun-with-angles</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
